title: Wild Iberia
overview: The landscape of the Iberian Peninsula ranges from jungle-like forests to the driest deserts. In the north loom the snow-capped mountains of the Pyrenees and in the south flow the prairies. Filmed with super high-speed cameras and time-lapse photography, from the Iberian lynx to the Royal eagle; the ant lion to the dragonfly â€“ this is Spain, wild and alive.
